Everything was clean, warm, quiet, nice (as on the picture an as it was described)... the location is perfect just 3 minutes walk to the nearest metro and easy to get to gard de nord and airport. We had a late flight back home and georges allowed us to leave luggage in his apartment, so that we could spend the day in the city without worries... This is a great place for stay in Paris. I would definitely return on the same adress....p.s. just next door is perfect boulangerie and fromangerie :) everything you need in one street. Thnx U G!

reviews.name: Jake
reviews.text: This is a wonderfull tiny studio that is perfectly located. Only a five min walk to the Gare Du Nord train station and a two min walk to the metro. The apartment has everything you need to cook or make coffee and tea. Gearges made arriving and departing very simple and easy. It is a perfect apartment for one person or a couple that doesn't need much space. I am sensative to smell and there is a slight odor that comes from the drains. There are plug in air fresheners that cover the smell. I would recomend this apartment to everyone unless you don't like smell of plug in air fresheners or old pipes. Thanks for the great stay in paris!!!!!

reviews.name: Hel
reviews.text: This studio provides a comfortable and cozy place to stay in Paris. It is perfect for single travelers or a couple as the place is small but perfectly reasonable in size for its purpose. The studio is very well-equipped with loads of gadgets, including an iPod dock which usefully doubled up as an iPhone charger. The place is on the side of a lovely courtyard, all behind secure gates from the street outside. It is also conveniently located about 10 minutes walk from Gare du Nord and even less from the local metro station. The host was very hospitable and kindly accommodated our travel plans such as a late arrival and a late departure. I would definitely recommend this place as ideal for a city stay being affordable, comfortable and clean with a pleasant host and in a fair location.

reviews.name: Saloni
reviews.text: We absolutely loved staying at Georges's apt in Paris! His apartment is clean, modern and adorable. Yes, it is small but it is perfect for a couple! It is centrally located with some great neighborhood staples on the main street. He was very kind, informative, and responsive. There is a cute little courtyard that you have to go through to get to the door leading up to the apartment. So Parisienne! We would absolutely stay at his apt again!

reviews.name: Siew Hia
reviews.text: We had a really great stay in George's apartment. He was being a wonderful host, given as much as help we needed. He is so much flexible for the timing of checking in and checking out as compare to other owners, Location is nice, walking distance from Gare de Nord and Gare d'Est station, owner is perfect. I guess these are the main concerns for choosing an apartment. Strongly recommended!!!

reviews.name: Sharon
reviews.text: Georges and Jean Luc have a beautiful studio space that is perfect for two people! I had the pleasure of staying there with my mother and found it to be very quiet and well equipped. The hospitality shown by Georges and Jean Luc was wonderful ! Merci beaucoup for the birthday vin! Even with Georges in Carcasonne, he stayed in touch and made sure everything was going well during our stay. This is my second time using airbnb and I can't say enough good things about this way of travelling and experiencing other places. Thank you again to both Georges and Jean Luc!! Merci

reviews.name: Arna
reviews.text: Georges was an incredibly warm and helpful host! He gave us a full run down of what the room offered, gave us a gorgeous bottle of wine to share on the night we arrived and told us about all the best places to eat! He mentioned Chez Papa for authentic and reasonably priced French food. We went on the Saturday night and had snails! I would definitely recommend the snails in leek- delicious! The food was wonderful. Georges left us to our own devices to explore the city and just told us to drop the keys off before we left on the Sunday evening. Highly recommended; warm friendly host and close to the metro. 5/5!

reviews.name: Andrea
reviews.text: Nice little studio in the centre of Paris. The flat is nicely and smartly equipped. The neighbourhodd is fantastic, with lovely bakeries and delicatessen just next door (literally). The flat is 2 minutes away from the closest metro station, and only 10-20 min. away from the main touristic destinations in Paris, like Montmartre, Notre Dame, the Louvre and so on. George was very friendly and kind. and welcomed me with a delicious bottle of wine. Should I be back in Paris, I would definitely ask George to stay in his lovely studio.

reviews.name: Mikhail
reviews.text: I stayed in Georges's studio for three days in the end of September together with my wife. The studio is very nice, conveniently located and has everything you might want to have in a studio and even more - 100% value for money. Last but not least Georges is a very warmly welcoming host. Would definitely recommend for couples, and would come back myself.

reviews.name: Michela
reviews.text: Our holiday was great ! George and Jean Lu were very kind and friendly! It's a small apartment but there is everything inside, they welcomed us with the breakfast after a long delay of the flight ! If we come back to Paris, hope the place will be available! merci beaucoup pour tout!

reviews.name: Alex
reviews.text: Nice flat! Comfortable, very quiet, well located! Compact, but you'll find everything (houshold equipment) you need even vacuum cleaner ))) Very close to metro stations, to pleasant shops (chees, womanbags... etc) Georges and Jean-Luc are the best hosts ever! Very friendly and ready to help you. So - highly recommended! Alex& Tatiana

reviews.name: Nate
reviews.text: Georges was a great host! Very informative and pleasant. A perfect host for a first time traveler to Paris. We would recommend him to anyone. Nate and Migena

reviews.name: Megan
reviews.text: Georges was fabulous! Him and Jean-Luc were incredible hosts. They were always in contact from the beginning - and the place is beautiful, clean, and full of amenities. It is small, to be sure, but so convenient to the metro, nearby shops, and Gare du Nord, that doesn't really matter. Thanks for a wonderful stay and we'll definitely stay there again when in town - highly, highly recommended.

reviews.name: Nicolas
reviews.text: Georges and Jean-Luc were just amazing host. They represent the respecful spirit of AirBNB. From day one they made me feel like home. Georges showed me the great places around the neighborhood, along the canal St-Martin and even les Buttes Chaumont.There is everything you need around the studio, such as boulangerie, fromager, grocery, specialised wine saler and nice little bistro terrasse. It is also close to metro station La Gare de l'Est, where you can reach all the main lines. It's a perfect parisien size studio for a solo traveller or a couple. Even if it's not a big place, you have access to a small fridge, stove, microwave, coffee machine and everything you need to cook a meal. There is a wi-fi connection and a t.v. for rainy days. I've enjoyed taking l'apéro, le déjeuner or even diner with Georges and Jean-Luc. We've had good discussion while enjoying good food and wines. Even if ''redefined" the concept of Paris plage, I will always keep happy memories of my stay in Studio Charmant du Faubourg St-Martin. Merci Messieurs et à la prochaine.

reviews.name: Abbey
reviews.text: Georges was a lovely and attentive host! The apartment is situated on a divine internal courtyard, providing the perfect respite from crazy Parisian excursions. I recommend the apartment highly and look forward to my next stay!

reviews.name: Filip
reviews.text: Many thanks to George and Jean Luc for making our French holiday even better. We are grateful that we could stay in their stylish and comfy flat. We couldn't imagine calmer place in busy Paris. Just close the doors and you are in completely different world. The apartment is also very close to the metro station and less than 10 minutes far from train station Gare du Nord, where the train from CDG Airport stops. What's more, George and Jean Luc left us there things such as delicious marmalade, coca cola for refreshing or wine. In spite of the fact that the flat is quite small, we have no criticism about it. It is luxurious place if you think of the price and two easygoing guys. If we had chance to visit Paris again, we would definitely book it one more time because it's just worth it. P.S. from Míša: Thank you, George, that you made Filip to bring me breakfast in the morning! Nice to meet you.

reviews.name: Dan
reviews.text: In over 18 months of travel, Georges and Jean Luc were by far the most friendly, generous, hospitable and warmest hosts we had the pleasure of staying with. They were such a pleasure to stay with and we only wish we could have stayed longer than 5 nights. Georges is genuinely on Airbnb to meet people and to make them feel welcome in his home and his country. Georges and Jean Luc are such amazing hosts that you would think they have been doing it for years, but in fact we were their first guests. Georges came to meet us at the train station, which was very nice, and instantly we felt he was a great person, very genuine and nice to have a conversation with. It was my wife's birthday during our stay and Georges and Jean Luc went out of their way to make the day special for her. We were given lots of privacy but we also really appreciated Georges' fantastic recommendations for dinner and other things to do in Paris. The apartment - which is a separate self-contained apartment nearby Georges' apartment, is stylish, clean, modern, had a functional kitchen and everything else we needed and more - including TV, Wi-fi, very comfortable bed, very hot shower, maps and city brochures, etc etc. It is in a fantastic neighbourhood, with lots of excellent restaurants and bars, and also very close to several metro stops. There is a wonderful, wonderful cheese shop nearby which Georges can recommend, as well as a fantastic bakery. The apartment is very quiet and peaceful despite being near to everything. Above all else it is superb value considering you pay much much more for hotels, without the personal touches and practicality of the apartment - and of course the excellent hosts! Paris is a wonderful city, but for us it was made so much more special because of the unbelievable hospitality shown by Georges and Jean Luc, and because of the lovely apartment. We couldn't have wished for anything better and we are so glad we found Georges and Jean Luc. We will forever remember their generosity and warmth and very much hope one day to stay with them again in Paris, and also perhaps in their other place in the south of France. Look no further than this apartment - you won't regret it! Jean Luc and Georges, you will be forever welcome if you ever visit Australia and we hope we can one day return the hospitality you showed us. Thank you so much again!! Dan and Jessica

reviews.name: Pedro
reviews.text: Estamos super satisfeitos com os nossos 4 dias hospedados em casa do Georges. Um estúdio, pequenino, mas que para duas pessoas que procuram um local sossegado para descansar, depois de longos dias a passear, tem tudo o que é necessário. De realçar a limpeza e a cama, que apesar de divã, é confortável e bastante espaçosa. Os acessos aos transportes são fáceis, com 2 estações de metro e uma gare, a menos de 5 minutos a pé. Perto do estúdio é possível encontrarmos supermercados para as compras diárias. Imediatamente ao lado, a padaria com os melhores croissants que alguma vez provámos, bem como farmácia, restaurantes etc... O estúdio não está localizado na área mais central de Paris, no entanto, sempre nos sentimos seguros e acima de tudo, longe da confusão citadina pois o mesmo está inserido num pátio cuidado e privado, onde apenas os moradores têm acesso. Finalmente acerca de Georges, o nosso anfitrião, não podíamos estar mais satisfeitos. Desde a chegada até à partida mostrou-se sempre atencioso, prestável e muito simpático. Facilitou sempre o contacto e presenteou-nos com dois magníficos croissants, pain au chocolat, compotas e sumos. Tendo um voo tardio, e não podendo deixar as malas em casa, o próprio Georges cedeu-nos a sua casa para as guardar em segurança, enquanto desfrutávamos do último dia em Paris. Não tendo conseguido ver tudo o que queríamos, mesmo em 5 dias, este seria um local onde com 100% de certezas voltaríamos a ficar. - Very satisfied with our stay in Georges house. A tiny studio but for two persons who search for quiet place to rest, after long days walking for Paris, it is the best. Thumbs up for cleaning and bed quality! 2 near metro stations, less than 5 minutes by walking. Near the studio it's easy to find supermarkets, the best bakery of the street (with the best croissants that you will ever taste), pharmacy, restaurants etc ... Although the studio don't have the must central location, it's located in a very quiet and secure neighborhood, with a private and flowered courtyard. Finally about Georges, we couldn't be more pleased and satisfied. Always kind and helpful, easy contact. Give us croissants, bread with chocolate, jelly and juices. Because of our late flight Georges kept our bags safe while we walk for Paris. For the next time we will choose Georges studio again!

reviews.name: Susana
reviews.text: Demasiado agradable. Georges es un anfitrión excelente, el apto es muy cómodo y la ubicación muy buena

reviews.name: Bruna
reviews.text: Thanks Barbara for your nice comments I agree with you regarding the photos and the reality I told this to AirB&B as those photos were made by the official photographer from AirB&B It was for that I put some personal photos showing more the reality of the size of the studio and I put also the total surface of 18 m2

reviews.name: Leandro
reviews.text: O apartamento tem todo o necessário para ter um estadia muito agradável.Limpo, bonito e funcional. Nos surpreendeu a atenção do Georges mesmo, por motivos de força maior, estando ausente em nossa chegada. Recebemos mimos de boas vindas como vinho, croissant, geleias e café. O estúdio tem uma ótima localização, perto de supermercados e do Canal de Saint Martin além de se encontrar ao lado de uma estação de metrô. Não houve nenhum ponto negativo. Impecável do início ao fim. Muito obrigado Georges. Le studio a de tout le nécessaire pour un séjour très agréable. Propre, beau et fonctionnel. L'attention de Georges nous a surpris, même pour des raisons de force majeure, étant absent à notre arrivée. Nous avons reçu des régals de bienvenue comme du vin, des croissants, de la confiture et du café. Le studio dispose d'un emplacement idéal, à proximité des supermarchés et du Canal Saint Martin, en plus d'être à côté d'une station de métro. Il n'y avait pas de point négatif. Impeccable du début à la fin. Merci Georges.

reviews.name: Daniele
reviews.text: Bom día Cristiane, Why you do not tell us that it was your honey moon, we do some special things for honey moon ( champagne, flowers and bed linen more romantic) We will do this for your second honey moon in Paris Fuerte abrazo
